Review_title: True Heart-wrenching Story the world needs to see
Review_Text: This documentary captures the brokenness from an entire family and community after a overdose of Heroin laced with fentanyl takes another life, the life of Josiah Kouts. It grips your soul and heart from the moment it starts. This movie has a lot of great educational information about drugs/addiction and I think everyone, adults and children need to watch this!
Great movie and comes highly recommended. Very enjoyable.
This is a must see! We have personal friends who put great time and effort in the creation of this movie!

This film was really an eye-opening movie for me it shows how much this drug Pandemic is taking over the work it is horrible, we see young and old people suffer from drug use everyday. Not just in a small town like Safford but everywhere. This film is a must watch . 10/10 #worldchanger

Review_title: An unforgettable life~Josiah ~ taken by a thief!
Review_Text: SpoilerJoe Carlini reveals the life of Josiah, a genuinely happy, one of a kind, free-spirited, highly intelligent, adventurous, kind, giving, caring, loving, young man with exemplary morals and character who experienced all the good that life has to offer including a beautiful family, & a fairy tale love story that most dream about. The thief came in the form of heroin, & stole it all!
Watch it. I loved everything about this film. Hope i can watch it somewhere again!!
I just enjoyed it so much I had to come here and give it 10 stars. Worth your time!
This movie will help many people struggling with addiction
This movie needs to be in every rehab in America! The Kouts family has devoted their life's to make sure the opioid epidemic ends once and for all! This film is eye opening!
I went to the premier of this film and absolutely loved it. Such a raw, eye opening take on a huge problem nation, if not world wide. This is absolutely a must watch.
Truly opened my eyes to the world of drugs and how it can affect anyone and everyone, it does not discriminate! Josiah has the most beautiful soul. Beautiful and touching film. Highly recommend!!

A must see for anyone and everyone, especially those who have been affected by the opioid crisis. A real eye opener! A true story of a family torn apart by the loss of a loved one and having to pick up the pieces and move forward in the aftermath of such a tremendous loss. It's very heartfelt and raw, a great documentary.....very well made and I highly recommend it!

I had the opportunity to share the first version of this film with my Teenage Outreach Program. It made such a powerful impact. Josiah's story truly opened up the eyes of these youth regarding the dangers of opioids. I cried every class period that I showed it, as well as many youth, but they all claimed this was the most impactful lesson of the entire year. Thank you for sharing Josiah's story. Thank you for making a difference in the lives of our children.

Review_title: Heart wrenching yet beautiful tribute to an amazing young man.
Review_Text: Everyone knows someone battling addiction. This is a must see. This documentary is real life account of the loved ones and friends and community as a whole that have been effected by this young life that was lost too soon.

I loved this, coming from a recovering addict point of view, im not going to say im perfect at all, herion and meth used to be a big part if my life, I grew up telling my self I'd never would do drugs because i watch my loves lose them self to the drug. Then one day I thought I'd try it and I ended up getting hookeod n it. But when I lost my self to addiction it took 5 years from me I overdosed multiple times. When josiah passed it was my wake up call to change my life around, so I did i got sober. Im going on 3 years clean. Josaihs family didn't deserve this. No family does. Addiction is not just the person using battle but its the whole family's
We need more stories like this out there . Amazing cast and crew who put this together!

I seen the Premier and it was sure an eye opener it was a Beautiful Movie made with Love and Compassion what the family went threw was was so very sad and heart breaking. To see your child go threw a life like that and you try to do everything to help them but there's nothing that you can do but. Just watch them destroy6 there lives anf loose everything I think everyone should see this Movie when it does come out
Great flick. Definitely recommend. All around a good movie. Must see
This was a very compelling story and has the ability to raise awareness of overdose and how it affects so many families.
Wonderful movie!! Worked with Joe on a previous film, a true class act! His movies are always so heartfelt and powerful! Josiah is by far my favorite!!

Review_title: An eye opener, tear jerker, real life story!
Review_Text: This was an awesome movie, it's real, about a family and a young man that had a good life and was living the good life! He got mixed up with drugs and the everyday battle he went through to try and stay clean! It's an eye opener on how drugs can take over someone's life even though they were raised with love and support. I know the family personally, I knew Josiah he was an awesome kid and man! He loved life and his family, but drugs were just to powerful.. everyone should watch this, it should be shown in schools, I would recommend watching it together as a family and having a discussion afterwards! I watched it with my teenage boys!
